Title: Nothing to Hide
Writer: Fred Cavayé (adaptation), Fred Cavayé (dialogue), Filippo Bologna (film "Perfetti sconosciuti"), Paolo Costella (film "Perfetti sconosciuti"), Paolo Genovese (film "Perfetti sconosciuti"), Paola Mammini (film "Perfetti sconosciuti"), Rolando Ravello (film "Perfetti sconosciuti")
Actors: Bérénice Bejo, Suzanne Clément, Stéphane De Groodt, Vincent Elbaz
Plot: 3.5 couples meet for dinner party. The men have known each other for decades. After dinner they play a game of sharing texts, calls, e-mails etc. by placing all 7 cell phones on the table. Unexpected results as all have secrets.
